title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4500.19 - Vouchers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4500.19 - Vouchers

State Regulations
A vouchers is a document or card produced by a
pari-mutuel system device, with a value printed on its face, that is recorded
in and redeemed through the pari-mutuel system. (a) Vouchers are not accounts or account
wagers for purposes of this section. (b) Vouchers may only be used to place wagers
in-person and only pursuant to an approved plan of operation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4500.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
